abstract: Friends and family of fashion insider John Fairchild, publisher of Women's Wear Daily who died at age 87, attend his memorial service at Church of the Ascension in West Village; Fairchild is remembered for both his barbs and his eye for talent.
lead_paragraph: At his memorial service, the publisher John Fairchild was remembered for both his barbs and his eye for talent.

headline.main: Fashion Pays Tribute to John Fairchild
headline.print_headline: Fashion Pays Tribute to One Who Shaped It

snippet: At his memorial service, the publisher John Fairchild was remembered for both his barbs and his eye for talent.
